headline: Northrop Grumman (NOC) Profit Margin Jumps to 9.7%, Challenges Cautious Growth Narratives
summary: Northrop Grumman (NOC) posted a net profit margin of 9.7%, sharply higher than the 5.6% margin from the previous period, as earnings leapt 72.6% year over year. Despite this earnings acceleration, ongoing growth rates are set to lag the market, with forecasts pointing to 6.1% annual earnings growth and 4.4% revenue growth per year, both trailing broad market averages. With a Price-To-Earnings ratio of 21.8x that undercuts industry peers and strong historical profit consistency, investors see...

headline: Pent-Up Demand Helps Defense Contractors Weather Government Shutdown
summary: The government shutdown has done little to curb defense-contractor profits--at least not yet.  Big weapons suppliers like Lockheed Martin and RTX benefited from surging third-quarter demand for jet fighters, missile systems and other ammunition, prompting them to raise their 2025 profit and sales targets.  Rival Northrop Grumman also boosted its adjusted profit target as executives said the U.S. government shutdown that started this month has yet to threaten the company’s bottom line.

content.title: Pent-Up Demand Helps Defense Contractors Weather Government Shutdown
content.summary: The government shutdown has done little to curb defense-contractor profits--at least not yet.  Big weapons suppliers like Lockheed Martin and RTX benefited from surging third-quarter demand for jet fighters, missile systems and other ammunition, prompting them to raise their 2025 profit and sales targets.  Rival Northrop Grumman also boosted its adjusted profit target as executives said the U.S. government shutdown that started this month has yet to threaten the company’s bottom line.

headline: Northrop Grumman (NOC) Q3 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: The Northrop Grumman team delivered another strong quarter of performance amidst a dynamic global environment.  The investments we have been making in capacity and capability over the last six years enable us to deliver with urgency against our customers' highest priority.  In addition, the team delivered another outstanding quarter of operating performance.

headline: Stocks Hold Steady as Earnings Reports Pile In
summary: The Nasdaq Composite was down slightly.  The yield on the 2-year Treasury note was down to 3.46%.  “The pace of earnings reports is finally starting to pick up, and what has been a strong reporting period so far in terms of results has remained that way this morning,” writes Bespoke Investment Group co-founder Paul Hickey.

content.title: Stocks Hold Steady as Earnings Reports Pile In
content.summary: The Nasdaq Composite was down slightly.  The yield on the 2-year Treasury note was down to 3.46%.  “The pace of earnings reports is finally starting to pick up, and what has been a strong reporting period so far in terms of results has remained that way this morning,” writes Bespoke Investment Group co-founder Paul Hickey.

headline: Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) Misses Q3 Revenue Estimates
summary: Security and aerospace company Northrop Grumman (NYSE:NOC) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025 as sales rose 4.3% year on year to $10.42 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $41.8 billion at the midpoint came in 0.9% below analysts’ estimates. Its GAAP profit of $7.67 per share was 18.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
